bill.summary:
Centralized Opioid Guidance Act of 2018 or the COG Act of 2018
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to publish and periodically update all guidance issued since January 1, 2016, related to the prescription of opioids for Medicare beneficiaries.
